channel.title: Eclipse on Ambiguous Implicits - Paul Lysak's blog about programming
channel.description: Recent content in Eclipse on Ambiguous Implicits - Paul Lysak's blog about programming

item.title: Integration test sources with eclipse-sbt
item.description: Finally found this answer: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/23229864/how-can-i-show-a-source-directory-to-sbteclipse-without-adding-it-to-the-compile to a question: how to include integration test sources in Scala IDE (Eclipse) - just add the following line to your build.sbt: EclipseKeys.configurations := Set(Compile, Test, IntegrationTest)
